description.tooltip: Objets partitionnés par base de données
description.label: Objets partitionnés

queries.query: SELECT p.object_id, p.index_id, '[' + OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(p.object_id) + '].[' + OBJECT_NAME(p.object_id) + ']' as TableName, COALESCE(MIN(i.name), '(heap)') as IndexName, COUNT(*) as PartitionCount FROM sys.partitions p WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) JOIN sys.indexes i WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON p.[object_id] = i.[object_id] AND p.index_id = i.index_id WHERE OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(p.object_id) NOT IN ('sys') GROUP BY p.object_id, p.index_id HAVING CAST(COUNT(*) -1 as bit) = 1;
